changelog.md.S'il n'y a pas d'information sur la mise: If there is no information on the update, it means that it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Fix un soucis d'installation de dépendan: Fixed a dependency installation issue that could occur on some installations
changelog.md.Ajout d'un redémarrage du demon toute le: Added a restart of the daemon every night to avoid a memory problem
changelog.md.La compatibilité avec Debian 10 n'est pl: Compatibility with Debian 10 is no longer guaranteed, if you are still on Debian 10 and have no problems, do not install the update
changelog.md.Correction de l'installation des dépenda: Fixed the installation of dependencies on Jeedom v4.2
changelog.md.Mise à jour du script de dépendances sui: Update of the dependencies script following the cryptography change
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur les dépendanc: Fixed a problem with buster dependencies
changelog.md.relancez les dépendances si vous êtes co: restart the dependencies if you are faced with a problem
changelog.md.Gestion des les dépendances de certains: Management of the dependencies of certain installations corrupted by third parties of cryptography in python 3
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.il faut probablement relancer les dépend: you probably need to restart the dependencies
changelog.md.lire la documentation pour la particular: read the documentation for the particularity
changelog.md.Ajout d'un apprentissage avancé RF avec: Added advanced RF learning with two stages, one to vary frequencies and find it and another to learn
changelog.md.Rajout de l'image des SC1: Addition of the image of SC1

index.md.Plugin permettant d'interfacer Jeedom av: Plugin to interface Jeedom with Broadlink equipment
index.md.Après avoir installé le plugin, il faut: After installing the plugin, it must be activated and ensure the correct installation of dependencies
index.md.Il est déconseillé de changer le port so: It is not recommended to change the internal socket port
index.md.Aller dans le menu Plugins => Protocole: Go to the Plugins menu => Home automation protocol => Broadlink
index.md.Une fois sur la page, cliquez sur le bou: Once on the page, click on the INCLUDE button
index.md.En toute logique l'ensemble des produits: Logically, all the Broadlink products in your network will be recognized
index.md.Si ce sont des produits de type Infra ro: If these are Infrared type products, a learn a command button appears at the top
index.md.Il vous suffit de cliquer dessus, vous a: Just click on it, then you have 5 seconds to learn an infrared command or 433 to your broadlink
index.md.Suite à cela le plugin vous confirmera l: Following this, the plugin will confirm the success of the operation and will create the associated command that you simply need to name
index.md.télécommande d'un voisin ou autre: remote control from a neighbor or other
index.md.Pour éviter d'apprendre ce qui pourrait: To avoid learning what might come from the environment
index.md.le Broadlink en mode apprentissage se me: the Broadlink in learning mode VOLUNTARILY goes to a very low reception level, so you have to be VERY close to the Broadlink to learn a command, especially if it is a 433Mhz command
index.md.Sur l'onglet Commandes d'un équipement v: On the Commands tab of an equipment you find the Synchronize button
index.md.Si vous possédez plusieurs Broadlink vou: If you have several broadlinks you can transfer the commands learned from one broadlink to another
index.md.Cela marche d'un rm-pro vers un mini ou: It works from a rm-pro to a mini or vice versa
index.md.Vous pouvez choisir les commandes à tran: You can choose the orders to transfer as well as the broadlinks to which you want to transfer them
index.md.Le nom de la commande sera bien évidemme: The name of the command will of course be converted (TV ON, fan off, etc
index.md.Si vous ajoutez manuellement votre devic: If you manually add your device because not autodetected
index.md.L'afresse MAC à renseigner est l'adresse: The MAC address to be entered is the reverse MAC address per packet of two in lowercase without the colons
